articles.title: Adm. Brett Giroir: Absolutely no politics in vaccine distribution
articles.description: Adm. Brett Giroir tells CNN's Jake Tapper that politics will play no part in the coronavirus vaccine distribution, despite President Donald Trump's suggestion to a crowd at a Pennsylvania rally.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: This is the best map of the 2020 election you'll see
articles.description: Maps -- especially in politics -- can be misleading. Especially when you are talking national elections.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: The case for Mitch McConnell to vote to convict Donald Trump
articles.description: On Wednesday afternoon, the House will impeach President Donald Trump for a second time. It is known. The only real drama will be to see how many House Republicans cross the aisle to vote with Democrats to impeach the President.
articles.content:

articles.title: Analysis: Black Southerners are wielding political power that was denied their parents
articles.description: The Democrats' stunning victories in Georgia were partly the result of generations of African Americans moving to Atlanta and the Deep South -- reversing their ancestors' northward migration patterns and changing the electorate.
